name: CyberOdyssey
description:
The CYBERATTACK has begun!

Fight against cyber-viruses, bugs (intentional or not) and programs run amok, trying to survive as long as possible!

Level up, fight 4 different enemies and try to be the best!

Controls

WASD to move

SPACE for dash

LMB to shoot

From the options menu you can change your username!

Credits

The game was rushed in 3 days, for the ScoreSpace Jam 2022. The game may have a lot of bugs, so if you do, you can report them and I will try to fix them as soon as possible.

Team

Programming, Art, Game Design, SFX by Michele Chirra

Music by Jacopo Palone

Tracks

"CyberOdyssey" by Jacopo Palone

Known Issues

If you don't change the username before starting the game, it might not write the name in the final ranking, so I suggest you change it and insert the nickname you prefer in the options menu;

Unfortunately, enemies spawn incorrectly, and there are cases of enemies that are invisible or too large;

Apologies for the various bugs, but this is what happens when you work in a hurry. I'm already working on various fixes and adding new features, the game will continue regardless of the Game Jam!

Have fun!
